title: Pope Says He Made ‘Grave Mistakes’ in Handling Accusations of Sex-Abuse Coverup in Chile
text:
/ kenya Pope Says He Made ‘Grave Mistakes’ in Handling Accusations of Sex-Abuse Coverup in Chile 
ROME—Addressing one of the most divisive controversies of his pontificate, Pope Francis said he made “grave mistakes” in the case of a Chilean bishop accused of covering up clerical sexual abuse, whom the pontiff had long and vociferously defended, and asked “forgiveness of all those whom I offended,” including victims of the abuse.
